Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel pump bearing wear beyond limits. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 09/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
